name: Tower Twist
description:
Tower Twist is our take on a tower defense classic. Made for Ludum Dare 50 in 48 hours with a team.

Controls:

Mouse click to place the towers.

X and Z to rotate the platform.

WSAD and/or mouse to pan

Scroll to zoom in and out.

NOTE: It's more proof of concept thing than a fully realised game. Only most basic features. :)

Programming: Filip, Game Design: Arsen and Timo, Art: Marta 

Other contributions: Vaso, Marko, Sinisha, Bobo.
